Changelog
~~~~~~~~~

0.0.2 (2008-04-19)
  * added PyCurl based URLGetter
  * improved performance (with PyCurl)
  * connection time statistics (with PyCurl)
  * new package structure
  * fix: added ``*.txt`` to manifest (LICENSE.txt was missing in 0.0.1 .tar)
  * added tests (nose)

0.0.1 (2009-04-13)
  * first release
